name: Vs. Whisker
description:
Ribbon got caught trespassing in a shady facility! While you make your escape, a floating Screen chats with you.

VimJam 2: Boss

Theme: On the Edge

Diversifier: By the Hand - Use only hand-drawn art;   I did this unwittingly. I didn't know there were optional challenges until half-way through the jam.

*Edit: It looks like I misinterpreted "By the Hand" a little bit rip. I thought it meant anything drawn by hand including raster graphics. But I guess it's supposed to mean traditional or traditional looking art.

I've attempted a couple Jams before, but this is the first game I've (mostly) completed on time and is my first upload to itch. The biggest thing I couldn't implement in time was enemy AI. And a walk cycle. Art is hard.

HTML Note: Hitting the Quit button crashes the game.

Controls:

I've enabled both Keyboard + Mouse and Gamepad, but you'll need the MOUSE to navigate the Title/Pause menus.

Move: A D; Left/Right Arrows

Quick Fall: S; Down Arrow

Jump: Space; W; Up Arrow

Kick: J; Left-Mouse Click

Pause: Tab; ESC; Enter

Engine: Godot

Credits

Art by me, L. PocketShadow; majority made during the jam. 

Music by Teknoaxe (Royalty Free) 

Tracks used:

  • Vacation in the Cryptosphere
  • The Harrowing
  • Chiptune Shopping Adventures

SFX generated by BFXR

Font: https://www.dafont.com/quadrangle.font
